page.title: 13Events in Longdon
page.content: These are{organised}by the {church, the{school}or Village{Hall management {committee. The {school }holds a {special carol service,{but}the{Harvest Festival}and {Christingle services} are held in {church. The church organises a{Fete}annually to raise money with plant & produce, bric-a-brac, guess the weight/number of..., bottle stalls and raffles. An annual{ flower and vegetable show is organised, held this year on 31st. August. A{Bingo}evening is held{once a month and the occasional{Dance }and {Coffee {Morning}is run to{raise funds. There are{2 Sports days,}one for the children at the school and the second for all the resident children. These are held on the village playing field, opposite the Hall.
